sentences.en: Aboriginal art has finally gained recognition and broken away from being labelled as "primitive" or "exotic"
sentences.cn: 土著艺术最终获得了承认，并摆脱了“原始”或“异域情调”的标签。

sentences.en: Consumers are increasingly interested in the authentically exotic tastes.
sentences.cn: 消费者对于真正的异国风味越来越情有独钟。

sentences.en: Flavour your favourite dishes with exotic herbs and spices.
sentences.cn: 把异国风味的芳草和香料加到你最喜爱的菜肴里调味。

sentences.en: He likes the bird with exotic plumage.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢那只有奇特羽毛的鸟.

sentences.en: He sent a basket of exotic fruit and a card.
sentences.cn: 他送了一篮子异域水果和一张卡片。

sentences.en: He took frequent junkets with friends to exotic locales.
sentences.cn: 他经常和朋友们到一些具有异国情调的地方公款游玩。

sentences.en: I was beguiled by the romance and exotic atmosphere of the souks in Marrakech.
sentences.cn: 我被马拉喀什露天市场的浪漫情调和异域风情深深地吸引了。

sentences.en: Market traders display an exotic selection of the island's produce.
sentences.cn: 集市上的商贩摆出了一系列具有异域风味的该岛农产品以供选择。

sentences.en: She flits from one exotic location to another.
She has a partiality for exotic flowers.
She likes to wear exotic clothes.
the exotic blooms of the orchid
The extinct exotic bird's feather contains zinc.
sentences.cn: 那种已绝迹的珍奇的鸟的羽毛中含锌。

sentences.en: There are some exotic words in English language.
These herbs will inspire you to try out all sorts of exotic-flavoured dishes!
sentences.cn: 这些香草会激发你去品尝各种异国风味的菜肴！

words.tran_cn: 异国情调；异国风味；洋派

trans.tran_en: something that is exotic seems unusual and interesting because it is related to a foreign country – use this to show approval
